name: Bjarne Stroustrup
workplaces: Aarhus University, University of Cambridge, Texas A&M University , Bell Labs, Morgan Stanley, Columbia University
awards: Grace Murray Hopper Award (1993), ACM Fellow (1994),, IEEE Fellow (1994),  NAE Member(2004),  IEEE Computer Entrepreneur Award (2004),  William Procter Prize for Scientific Achievement (2005),  Dr. Dobb's Journal
